Load packages

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
```

Import data

```{r}
data <- read.csv("../data/augmented.csv")
```

Tobacco and alcohol

```{r}
ggplot(data=data,
       mapping = aes(x=alcohol,
                     y=tobacco,
                     color=chd))+
  geom_point()
```

Obesity and adiposity

```{r}

col_colours <- c("0" = "#0053B3", "1"="#FFAA17")
ggplot(data=data,
       mapping = aes(x=adiposity,
                     y=obesity,
                     color=factor(chd)))+
  geom_point()+ 
  geom_smooth(method = 'loess', formula = 'y~x') + scale_color_manual(values = col_colours)
```

Investigating family history

```{r}


ggplot(data,
       mapping = aes(x=inheritance))+
  geom_bar()+
  theme_minimal()

```
